title: Pixel Buds won't stop turning themselves on and connecting while in their case.
content:
Same issue as this thread that is locked for some reason
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/forum/AAAAb4-OgUshzE9HbaYa_M?hl=en

I have this issue and am on my third pair that have all had the case demagnetize.  What are you going to do to fix this? Why did you lock the other thread?  I need this fixed.  I do not want to buy a 4th pair.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
